title: Can we have new items next rather than new champ.
body:
It feels like AP and AD Carry items build the same literally every single game. And im not saying AP items are bad, but they're lackluster. It's boring when we just have the same things to build over and over. Rabadons and Void are a must now. Wishing we had more diversity <3

oh and AD carries are in the same situation, I dont play ADC though so I'd love some adc mains to throw out their opinion

________________________

I think people are misunderstanding me. I didn't mean rabadons is a must on EVERY champ, that would be silly.  Bust most champs that scale well build void and deathcap, and although there's nothing wrong with that damage-wise, it just becomes boring. Items should be situational and should have more of an affect on games.

items should be built on the game's situation, not because of that champ's stats. Maybe added items would help this work
